config.amount-of-horse-skins.name: Total Horse Skin Assets
config.amount-of-horse-skins.description: The number of .png files in the assets folder for this mod.
config.singleplayer-update-rate.name: Singleplayer Update Rate
config.singleplayer-update-rate.descript: How often to update horse textures in singleplayer (in ticks). Lower values mean more frequent updates but may impact performance.
config.multiplayer-update-rate.name: Multiplayer Update Rate
config.multiplayer-update-rate.descripti: How often to update horse textures in multiplayer (in ticks). Lower values mean more frequent updates but may impact network performance.
config.show-notifications.name: Show Notifications
config.show-notifications.description: Whether to show notifications when horse skins are updated.
config.play-sounds.name: Play Sounds
config.play-sounds.description: Whether to play sounds when horse skins are updated.
config.show-preview-animation.name: Show Preview Animation
config.show-preview-animation.descriptio: Whether to show the preview animation in the reskin menu.
config.success-message-color.name: Success Message Color
config.success-message-color.description: The color to use for success messages (in hex format, e.g. #FFD700 for gold).
config.remember-last-skin.name: Remember Last Skin
config.remember-last-skin.description: Whether to remember the last skin used for each horse.
config.auto-apply-last-skin.name: Auto-Apply Last Skin
config.auto-apply-last-skin.description: Whether to automatically apply the last used skin when a new horse is added.
menu.title: Horse Reskin
error.not-your-stable: You can only reskin your own horse at your stable.
